subject: Football
Coaches and Managers
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Seahawks Coach Pete Carroll, set to face New England, can join Weeb Ewbank and Jon Gruden as the only coaches to win the Super Bowl against teams that no longer wanted them.
snippet: Seahawks Coach Pete Carroll, set to face New England, can join Weeb Ewbank and Jon Gruden as the only coaches to win the Super Bowl against teams that no longer wanted them.
